rows.label: tlk44400084_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, it's just a small thing
that's been on my mind...

rows.label: tlk44400084_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Now, Teos Aure is quite a warm
place, but Luxuria as a whole
is rather chilly, isn't it?

rows.label: tlk44400084_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Not only that, but the living costs
are very high too. The children can
rarely afford to buy new clothes.

rows.label: tlk44400084_04_msg0005
rows.name:
So I thought, well, why
don't I try making some warm
clothes for them myself?

rows.label: tlk44400084_04_msg0006
rows.name:
But then I realized I'd need many
more Fresh Rodonya pelts if I was
going to make that happen.

rows.label: tlk44400084_04_msg0007
rows.name:
I don't suppose you could
help, could you...?

rows.label: tlk44400084_04_msg0008
rows.name:
You'll get some pelts for
me? Well! You're too kind!

rows.label: tlk44400084_04_msg0009
rows.name:
In that case, I'll let you get
on with it then! Ta very much!
